actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts, and Humanities

official_title: A concurrent resolution to reaffirm the policy of the United States that public education is the cornerstone of our democratic system and its belief that continuing support for our public schools is essential to the realization of the social and economic goals upon which the future of our country depends.

summary.text: Reaffirms the policy of the United States with respect to continuing support for public schools.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to reaffirm the policy of the United States that public education is the cornerstone of our democratic system and its belief that continuing support for our public schools is essential to the realization of the social and economic goals upon which the future of our country depends.
